dcterms:description: An initial dataset of decentralized applications spanning various categories, including finance, art, gaming, and technology, serving as a resource for researchers and practitioners interested in analyzing DApp structures and network topologies.
dcterms:title: Decentralized Applications (DApps) Dataset

dcterms:creator: S. Bartolucci
G. Destefanis
M. Ortu
N. Uras
M. Marchesi
R. Tonelli
dcterms:description: A curated repository built to assess the performances of smart contracts vulnerability detection tools, containing smart contracts from various decentralized applications.
dcterms:title: DAppScan Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset providing insights into the complex networks of smart contract interactions within decentralized applications, serving as a foundation for future studies on DApp structures and potential security concerns.
dcterms:title: MindTheDApp Dataset
